name: Connor (itch)
description:
See what's at the end of everything. Drive a road haunted by a voice who knows you all too well. Question the games medium as a whole. Peek into a depressed mind. Connor is what you make of it.

  • Introspective and meta story
  • Three Endings
  • Original soundtrack by Glidelas (provided as .wav in game files)
  • A theme around futility and determination

WARNING: Themes present may be interpreted in disturbing manners - Play at your own risk.

Interested in more OKSoft projects? Get in touch on our Discord or visit our website!
